title: Is my IP / region banned?
body:
Yesterday, I started getting bad lag during game, the servers seemed down, etc.

Today, I was trying to log in and I couldn't.  A little later, I DID log in, but I realized I had a VPN on.  I turned the VPN off, and couldn't log in again.  I turned it back on, and I COULD log in again.

What does this mean?  Is my IP banned?  Is my region banned?  (I'm playing NA server from outside NA)

When I COULD play yesterday, other people were complaining of server problems.  Are they resolved, or not?  I've spent hundreds of dollars on skins, and the thought that I might be getting region-banned is really gonna tilt me.

replies.body:
There were service issues late last night that has been resolved since then, however, I don't think they'd affect your ability to log in today. Since you're playing from outside the US, it's possible there may be issues with your route to the server, especially since you can successfully login with a VPN. 
 
Let's take a look at your route to the server with a traceroute using [WinMTR.](http://winmtr.net/) Be sure to disable your VPN before running this. After booting up the WinMTR app, enter 104.160.131.1 into the host field, then start the trace. After it has run for 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them here in a reply to this post.

Let me know if you have any questions.
